body_html:
@carpodaster yes, I think it's good to stick to actual integers for that field, too.
I'd still like to have a separate text field for financial stuff, in case they need to specify certain "special circumstances". However we can also drop application_minimum_money and create a brand new column (so all the info from the previous column we had is flushed) or just.. get rid of all the sensitive data we've had in there so far. Or do you disagree with this and think we should scrap it completely?
regarding the application_language_learning_period: yes, I briefly thought about that before adding it. I decided to still go ahead, because I felt it made give us some extra insight in the application, but it's an arbitrary decision I made and I understand how it could actually cause more havoc than anything else — happy to change or remove it (we can also redirect that to be the learning time for their primary project or whatever).
